title: I NEED HELP
body:
Ok so I just bearly got internet back after three weeks and a new system to boot a 1060 strix with 6500, I downloaded league its on my ssd no major programs seperated on the hdd so. 

I do the new client everything goes good a little warning about booting legacy client first since they having trouble transferring. I queue up and when the timer stops black and then bugsplat.

I click reconnect black for a second or two and bugsplat

I download the hextech repair tool nothing,
 I restart client and system nothing,
 I turn firewalls off nothing,
I turn of IP Helper nothing,
I run legacy client same problem,
I uninstall and run legacy client first and still same issue.

It sucks to finally be back but be able to play

replies.body:
Bugsplats often occur if there's an issue going on with either your system drivers (outdated/corrupt) or hardware (failure). I'd strongly recommend working through our [**Bugsplat Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) to ensure this cannot be easily resolved with a common solution.

Let me know if this helped.
I have all drivers and bios
